name: Template 1 - Welcome Series: First Email
preview_text: Welcome to the AI family, {{first_name}}! Let's get you started with your free resource.
subject: ü•≥ Welcome to [Company Name]! Your journey starts here.
html_content:
Welcome Aboard, {{first_name}}!

We're thrilled to have you join the [Company Name] community. Our mission is to simplify your life using the power of AI.

Your First Step: Claim Your Free Guide

As a thank you for signing up, we've prepared a quick-start guide to help you master our platform in 10 minutes or less.

DOWNLOAD FREE GUIDE NOW

If you have any questions, simply reply to this email. We're here to help!

Cheers,
The [Company Name] Team

We're thrilled to have you join the [Company Name] community. Our mission is to simplify your life using the power of AI.

name: Template 4 - Weekly Content Newsletter

The AI Weekly Digest

Hello {{first_name}}, here are the biggest stories, tutorials, and insights from the world of AI this week.

Top Story: The Rise of Deepfakes

Deepfake technology is becoming scarily realistic. Read our analysis on the ethical and technological challenges this presents...

Read Full Article »

Tutorial: Speed up your code with GPT-4

Learn how to integrate the latest generative AI into your development workflow to write and debug code faster than ever before.

name: Template 12 - Account Billing Failure Notification
preview_text: Your recent payment failed. Please update your details to prevent service interruption.
subject: ‚ùå Action Required: Your [Company Name] Payment Failed
html_content:
Payment Failed for {{billing_date}}

Hi {{first_name}}, we were unable to process your payment for your [Company Name] subscription. Your service is at risk of interruption.

Please Update Your Payment Information

To ensure uninterrupted access to your AI tools, please update your billing details immediately.

  • Amount Due: ${{amount}}
  • Date of Next Attempt: {{next_attempt_date}}

UPDATE PAYMENT METHOD

If you've already updated your details, please disregard this email.
author: Akili AI
notes: High-priority transactional email. Clear, concise, and focused on the solution (updating card).

name: Template 13 - Educational/How-To Email (Drip Series)
preview_text: Master prompt engineering: The secret to getting perfect results from any LLM.
subject: üí° [Lesson 2] Master the Art of AI Prompt Engineering
html_content:
Lesson 2: The 'Perfect Prompt' Framework

Welcome back, {{first_name}}! In today's lesson, we're diving deep into the structure of an effective AI prompt. Stop getting generic answers and start getting highly targeted results.

The 3 Key Components:

  1. Role: Tell the AI who it is (e.g., 'Act as a Senior Data Scientist').
  2. Task: State the clear goal (e.g., 'Generate 5 unique marketing headlines').
  3. Context/Constraint: Provide necessary background and limitations.

Ready to put it into practice? We've set up an exclusive exercise for you on the platform.

START YOUR EXERCISE

Stay tuned for Lesson 3 on Friday!
plain_text:
[Lesson 2] Master the Art of AI Prompt Engineering

Lesson 2: The 'Perfect Prompt' Framework
Welcome back, {{first_name}}! In today's lesson, we're diving deep into the structure of an effective AI prompt. Stop getting generic answers and start getting highly targeted results.

The 3 Key Components:
1. Role: Tell the AI who it is.
2. Task: State the clear goal.
3. Context/Constraint: Provide necessary background and limitations.

Ready to put it into practice? We've set up an exclusive exercise for you on the platform.

[START YOUR EXERCISE]({{cta_url}})

Stay tuned for Lesson 3 on Friday!
author: Akili AI
notes: Part of an educational drip series. Uses numbered lists and clear headings to break down complex information.

name: Template 18 - Cold Outreach/Lead Nurturing

Hi {{first_name}},

I noticed [Prospect Company Name] is heavily focused on {{industry}} and thought you might be facing the challenge of scaling your content creation without sacrificing quality.

The AI Solution for {{industry}}

Would you be open to a 15-minute call this week to see a quick, relevant case study?

Best,
{{sender_name}} | [Company Name]
